definition: a poison/a toxic agent/poison gas/a chemical weapon

pinyin: quan2 shen1 zhong1 du2 xing4 du2 ji4
fei4 ci4 ji1 xing4 du2 ji4

sentences.english: He swilled his room out with antiseptic.
OBJECTIVE To observe the effect of air sterilization by the herbal medicine Changshu disinfectant.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察苍术消毒剂对空气消毒的效果。

sentences.english: To develop determination method of ursolic acid in Chinese herb disinfector with HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 建立中药消毒剂中熊果酸的高效液相色谱法。

sentences.english: Conclusion Changes of drug resistance has occurred to the bacteria isolated from in-use disinfectants in school medical rooms.
sentences.chinese: 结论消毒剂在使用过程中污染菌的耐药谱发生了改变。

sentences.english: There's no greater antidote for war than love.
sentences.chinese: 爱是战争的最好解毒剂。

sentences.english: The mode of action of V-type organophosphate poisons on acetylcholinesterase has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了V类毒剂与乙酰胆碱酯酶的作用方式。

sentences.english: WD complex iodine is a Kind of new iodophor.
sentences.chinese: WD复合碘为碘伏类消毒剂。

sentences.english: Electrolyzed oxidizing water (EOW) has been regarded as a new sanitizer in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 酸性氧化电位水是近年来应运而生的一种新型消毒剂。

sentences.english: The wound was carefully washed; then an antiseptic, tincture of iodine, was applied.
sentences.chinese: 伤口被仔细地清洗了，然后涂上消毒剂碘酒。

sentences.english: Objective To study resistance of Neisseria gonorrhoeae to chemical disinfectants.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解淋病奈瑟菌对化学消毒剂的抗力。

sentences.english: Chlorine could be used to disinfect the treated wastewater as disinfectant.
sentences.chinese: 液氯作为消毒剂可用于对处理后的城市污水进行消毒。

sentences.english: Objective To study the disinfection efficacy of compound disinfectant of peracetic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究过氧乙酸复方消毒剂消毒效果。

sentences.english: To get rid of them, clean the entire sink area with a disinfectant.
sentences.chinese: 要把他们除掉，用消毒剂清唰水池的入口周围。

sentences.english: Potassium iodide pills are not "radiation antidotes".
sentences.chinese: 钾片碘片都并非“核辐射解毒剂”。

sentences.english: The dosage of neutralizer is closely related to the dosage of disinfectant to be neutralized.
sentences.chinese: 中和剂用量与中和消毒剂量间有较密切的关系。

sentences.english: Bromine based biocides are gaining popularity due to environmental restrictions on chlorine.
sentences.chinese: 由于环境对氯的限制，使得溴成为广为接受的消毒剂。

definition: poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
